profile.name: Sean McArthur
profile.bio: Independent maintainer of @hyperium, @tower-rs, and other 🦀 Rust networking libraries.

analysis.career_trajectory: Started with Python in 2020, pivoted to Rust systems programming in late 2023

comment_analytics.communication_style: Asks deep architectural questions, Nitpicks code style, Supportive mentor

match_profile.similar_user_traits: A developer who is passionate about async programming and HTTP/3
conversation_starters: What are some common pitfalls when implementing database sharding?
How do you approach optimizing the performance of HTTP/3 connections?
Can you walk me through your experience with rustls and its implications on Rust development?
